name: LD41 - Train of Fortune: Screensaver Edition
name_original: LD41 - Train of Fortune: Screensaver Edition
description: My first every Ludum Dare game jam entry that I made in collaboration with a friend of mine. The theme for the game jam was to combine two incompatible genres, so we decided on a train sims and tower defense. Ultimately we didn't finish it as it's more of a screensaver than an actual game, but we're still pretty happy with the results.  I hope you enjoy playing watching it, as we certainly enjoyed making it.
